package.json.name: helpme-breathe
package.json.description: Natural breathing exercises for wellness and relaxation

scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run compress
scripts.compress: gzip -9 -c dist/index.html > dist/index.html.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/assets/*.css > dist/assets/styles.css.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/assets/*.js > dist/assets/scripts.js.gz

package.json.author: Georges Rayess

manifest.json.name: Help Me Breathe - Natural Breathing Journey
manifest.json.description: Free nature-inspired breathing exercises for wellness and relaxation

.github/workflows/deploy.yml.content:
name: Deploy to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    permissions:
      contents: read
      pages: write
      id-token: write
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      
    - name: Lint code
      run: npm run lint
      
    - name: Build project
      run: npm run build
      
    - name: Setup Pages
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
      uses: actions/configure-pages@v3
      
    - name: Upload artifact
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
      uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v2
      with:
        path: './dist'
        
    - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
      id: deployment
      uses: actions/deploy-pages@v2

README.md.content:
# Help Me Breathe ğŸŒ™

> Your natural guide to mindful breathing and inner peace

[![Deploy Status](https://github.com/gRAYESS123/helpme-breathe/workflows/Deploy%20to%20GitHub%20Pages/badge.svg)](https://github.com/gRAYESS123/helpme-breathe/actions)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)](http://makeapullrequest.com)

## âœ¨ Features

- **5 Breathing Techniques**: Deep Sleep (4-7-8), Focus & Grounding (Box), Heart Coherence, Quick Calm (Triangle), and Energy Boost (Wim Hof inspired)
- **Nature-Inspired Themes**: Beautiful animated backgrounds that change with each technique
- **Advanced Audio**: Binaural beats and natural breath sounds for enhanced experience
- **Time-Bound Sessions**: Set session durations (5-20 minutes) for optimal practice
- **Progress Tracking**: Monitor breath count, session progress, and statistics
- **Mobile Optimized**: Responsive design with touch-friendly controls
- **PWA Support**: Install as a native app on any device
- **Accessibility**: Full keyboard navigation and screen reader support
- **Performance**: Optimized animations and lightweight codebase

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Development

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/gRAYESS123/helpme-breathe.git
cd helpme-breathe

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev
```

### Production Build

```bash
# Build for production
npm run build

# Preview production build
npm run preview

# Deploy to GitHub Pages
npm run deploy
```

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Vanilla JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **PWA**: Vite PWA Plugin
- **Audio**: Web Audio API
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions

## ğŸ“± Browser Support

- Chrome 90+
- Firefox 88+
- Safari 14+
- Edge 90+
- Mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile)

## ğŸ¨ Breathing Techniques

### ğŸŒ™ Deep Sleep (4-7-8)
- **Purpose**: Deep relaxation and better sleep
- **Pattern**: Inhale 4s â†’ Hold 7s â†’ Exhale 8s
- **Theme**: Night sky with twinkling stars

### ğŸŒ¿ Focus & Grounding (Box)
- **Purpose**: Mental clarity and concentration
- **Pattern**: Inhale 4s â†’ Hold 4s â†’ Exhale 4s â†’ Hold 4s
- **Theme**: Earth tones with falling leaves

### ğŸ’— Heart Coherence
- **Purpose**: Emotional balance and stress reduction
- **Pattern**: Inhale 5s â†’ Exhale 5s
- **Theme**: Warm colors with water ripples

### â˜ï¸ Quick Calm (Triangle)
- **Purpose**: Instant stress relief
- **Pattern**: Inhale 3s â†’ Hold 3s â†’ Exhale 3s
- **Theme**: Sky blue with drifting clouds

### â˜€ï¸ Energy Boost (Wim Hof inspired)
- **Purpose**: Increase alertness and vitality
- **Pattern**: Inhale 2s â†’ Exhale 1s (rapid)
- **Theme**: Golden sunrise with sun rays

## âš™ï¸ Performance Optimizations

- **Reduced bundle size**: 40% smaller than previous version
- **Optimized animations**: Simple animations on mobile, complex on desktop
- **Lazy loading**: Audio system loads only when needed
- **Efficient DOM updates**: Batched updates with requestAnimationFrame
- **Service Worker**: Aggressive caching for offline functionality
- **Image optimization**: WebP format with fallbacks

## ğŸ”§ Configuration

### Session Duration
Set custom session lengths in the settings panel:
- 5 minutes (quick session)
- 10 minutes (default)
- 15 minutes (standard)
- 20 minutes (extended)
- Unlimited (manual control)

### Audio Settings
- Toggle breathing sounds on/off
- Binaural beats for enhanced relaxation
- Volume controlled via system settings

### Accessibility
- Full keyboard navigation support
- Screen reader compatible
- High contrast mode support
- Reduced motion preferences respected

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on our code of conduct and the process for submitting pull requests.

### Development Setup

1. Fork the repository
2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
5. Open a Pull Request
